column5: Large open floor plan that is made to entertain. This home features an formal living room, dining room, kitchen open to the dining room and family room. Secondary bedroom down with a full bath! Oversize mater bedroom is upstairs with sitting area, Game room is great for play room or third living area. Three additional bedrooms and bath complete the upstairs. Check out the large deck leading to the back yard! This home is warm and inviting so make it yours today.
